title: 为什么1.15.2的Fabric一旦创建物品，打包后就开启游戏就崩溃？
author: zhuzhuzhu2
txt_content:
[18:08:03] [main/WARN]: Error loading class: net/minecraft/client/gui/screen/TitleScreen (java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: net/minecraft/client/gui/screen/TitleScreen)
[18:08:03] [main/WARN]: @mixin target net.minecraft.client.gui.screen.TitleScreen was not found excel.mixins.json:ExampleMixin为什么会提示找不到class？

replies.author: zhuzhuzhu2
replies.txt_content:
1a2s3d4f1 发表于 2020-1-23 18:26
移除你自带的mixin
移除后在自己写一个？

replies.author: 1a2s3d4f1
replies.txt_content:
zhuzhuzhu2 发表于 2020-1-23 18:44
移除后在自己写一个？
不写了，只是添加物品要什么mixin

replies.author: zhuzhuzhu2
replies.txt_content: 好像是java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/minecraft/util/registry/Registry报错，然后崩溃了...

replies.author: 1a2s3d4f1
replies.txt_content:
zhuzhuzhu2 发表于 2020-1-23 19:02
好像是java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/minecraft/util/registry/Registry报错，然后崩溃了... ...
你不会是用了dev的包吧，这种没转换，当然崩

replies.author: 1a2s3d4f1
replies.txt_content:
zhuzhuzhu2 发表于 2020-1-23 19:15
怎么转换呢。。




QQ截图20200123192814.png (13.15 KB, 下载次数: 1)

下载附件

2020-1-23 19:28 上传





看包的名称，不带-dev的jar包就可以

replies.author: zhuzhuzhu2
replies.txt_content: 感谢，不过好像我没用dev的包，可能是快照版本问题，我换个正式版试试
